transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon, ma'am.
Customer: Good afternoon, sir. Bolie.
Executive: Ma'am, I am from Bhadravati, Deccan Industries Private Limited, ma'am.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Ma'am, Shahdab Bole, IndiaMART's account manager.
Customer: Ji, isliye maine video meeting ka ek kiya tha. Mujhe account manager kaun hai, puchna tha.
Executive: Ma'am, yaha pe aaya tha ki woh video meet ke liye aapko aaya tha.
Customer: Ji, ji. Kal 9:30 baje.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji, ma'am.
Customer: Video meet kal subah ho sakta hai kya aap?
Executive: Ma'am, yeh hai na ki ma'am aaj jo hai na, aaj Friday hai aur Saturday, Sunday.
Executive: Saturday, Sunday ma'am jo hota hai na, woh close hota hai.
Customer: Monday lijiye.
Executive: Ma'am, kya dikkat problem thi?
Customer: Video meet karna hai, hamare account manager se baat karne ka aur buyer se contact nahi ho pa raha hai, quantity bhi low aa raha hai.
Executive: Quantity low aa raha hai aur buyer se contact nahi ho pa raha hai.
Customer: Ji, call receive nahi kar rahe buyer.
Executive: Koi na ma'am, agar aapko abhi teen char minute hai na?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Abhi three to four minutes hai abhi?
Customer: Sir, abhi net ka issue hai, isliye main bol rahi hu, kal ya Monday ho jayega toh acha hai.
Executive: Toh ma'am, present time pe aapke paas bhi jo mera aa raha hoga, woh toh DID ke number hi aa raha hoga aapke paas, company ka number.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ma'am, main mera number aap note kar lijiye, main aapka account manager hu.
Customer: Ek minute sir, main likh rahi hu aapko.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Kya bataya sir aapne number?
Executive: 786.
Customer: 786.
Executive: Zero.
Customer: Zero.
Executive: 40.
Customer: 40.
Executive: 12.
Customer: 12.
Executive: 50.
Customer: 50. Naam kya tha sir aapka naam?
Executive: Ma'am, Shahdab.
Customer: Shahdab. Thik hai sir.
Executive: Ma'am, yeh sari detail na, aap agar kabhi aap profile pe jayengi na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh IndiaMART ke profile pe bhi aapko mera name aur mobile number wagera sari cheeze waha mention hoti hai. Kal kaise dekh sakte hai kya mujhe bata sakte hai, ma'am, individually, abhi net ka toh issue hai isliye.
Executive: Matlab kaise dekh sakte hai?
Customer: Ji, kaise dekh sakte hai mujhe bata sakte hai aap?
Executive: Name jo hum hum log ka ma'am woh aapko aata hai na, contact detail wagera.
Customer: Kaha par sir?
Executive: Ma'am, waha pe aap IndiaMART pe jab open karenge na, jis mobile phone pe karenge, jis profile tools woh rehta hai, dekho udhar ka kya?
Executive: Ma'am, profile mein waha pe kahi pe show karta hai ma'am.
Customer: Ek minute sir, isliye woh nahi ho pa raha hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir, yeh bhi mujhe Monday bata sakte hai aap, sir, abhi net ka issue hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir, bolie.
Executive: Ma'am, dashboard pe jaise aap click karenge na, sabse upar dashboard aapko aayega profile ke upar.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha, toh usme sabse niche slide karke aaiye, scroll karke.
Customer: Thik hai sir, sir, net ka issue hai isliye nahi ho pa raha hai, woh bhi baat bol rahi hu main. Net se kaun sa section rehta hai sir?
Executive: Ji ma'am?
Customer: Net ka issue hai isliye woh show nahi ho pa raha hai sir.
Executive: Ha, toh ma'am usse pata hai kya hoga, kabhi aap matlab jayiyega toh kis mein laptop aap dekh rahi thi na, PC mein.
Customer: PC mein dekh rahi hu sir.
Executive: Ha, toh PC mein jaise hi aap upar jaise profile dikh rahi hogi na, profile ke upar aap ek aapko dikhega dashboard. Dashboard.
Customer: Ha, dashboard mein jaise hi click karenge, sabse niche aap scroll scroll karke aayengi na, toh waha pe aapko meri sari contact detail dikh jayegi, expert assistant karke aayega mera name aur meri contact detail.
Executive: In future bhi agar koi bhi aapko change bhi hota hai na, toh wahi pe mention hoti hai sari cheeze.
Customer: Okay sir, thik hai.
Executive: Ha, aur ma'am yeh aapka jo concern tha isko kya karunga aapka jo video video call ka tha, isko toh Monday schedule kar denge.
Customer: Okay sir, chalega Monday schedule.
Executive: Ha. Ma'am aapka concern tha abhi video call ka, abhi isko main close kar de raha hu aur Monday mein video call kar lenge. Ma'am mera feedback aayega, mera feedback aayega aapke mail pe.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ha, toh ma'am usse satisfy kar dijiyega ma'am.
Customer: Okay sir, chalega.
Executive: Okay ma'am?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay, thank you ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to reschedule video meet to Monday.

- Not able to contact buyer; quantity low.

- Unable to locate account manager details.



Resolution:

- Executive provided personal contact number.

- Explained how to find contact details on profile.

- Video call rescheduled to Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on executive's mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, reschedule, contact details, account manager
